thread.section_title: Prince de Galles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could have been better
thread.title_full: Could have been better - Review of Prince de Galles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: shefpat
title: Could have been better
text:
Greeted upon arrival by doorman. And luggage was brought to our rooms as well.
Check in was easy and quick as well as check out.
Elevators are tight and I mean extremely small. The smallest I have come across for a 5 star hotel.
Rooms are comfortable and decorated nicely but are a little small for the price you pay. Bathrooms are good size but showers are in tubs and I hate that. Felt like I had to climb a mountain to get in and out of tub.
Service is 5 star and that's why I have rated them high.
